title: Ep. 29 :: Trader Special - Guests Jeff Clark and Stephanie Link
itunes:title: Trader Special - Guests Jeff Clark and Stephanie Link
description: Stephanie Link, Director of Research at TheStreet.com, talks market fundamentals, sectors and gives her best picks. Jeff Clark, editor of S&A's Advanced Income and The Short Report newsletters, talks technicals. He also tells us where gold and the Euro are headed.
